org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.rollup

Class VertexRollUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.rollup.RollUp
      • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.rollup.VertexRollUp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operator, UnaryBaseGraphToBaseGraphCollectionOperator<LogicalGraph,GraphCollection>, UnaryBaseGraphToValueOperator<LogicalGraph,GraphCollection>, UnaryGraphToCollectionOperator

    public class VertexRollUp
extends RollUp
    Applies the groupBy-operator multiple times on a logical graph using different combinations of the given vertex grouping keys according to the definition of the rollUp operation in SQL. See the description of the abstract class RollUp for further details.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.rollup.RollUp

        edgeAggregateFunctions, edgeGroupingKeys, strategy, vertexAggregateFunctions, vertexGroupingKeys

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VertexRollUp(List<String> vertexGroupingKeys, List<AggregateFunction> vertexAggregateFunctions, List<String> edgeGroupingKeys, List<AggregateFunction> edgeAggregateFunctions)
      Creates a vertexRollUp operator instance with GroupingStrategy.GROUP_REDUCE as grouping strategy.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.rollup.RollUp

    • Constructor Detail

      • VertexRollUp

        public VertexRollUp(List<String> vertexGroupingKeys,
                    List<AggregateFunction> vertexAggregateFunctions,
                    List<String> edgeGroupingKeys,
                    List<AggregateFunction> edgeAggregateFunctions)
        Creates a vertexRollUp operator instance with GroupingStrategy.GROUP_REDUCE as grouping strategy. Use RollUp.setGroupingStrategy(GroupingStrategy) to define a different grouping strategy.
        Parameters:
        vertexGroupingKeys - grouping keys to group vertices
        vertexAggregateFunctions - aggregate functions to apply on super vertices
        edgeGroupingKeys - grouping keys to group edges
        edgeAggregateFunctions - aggregate functions to apply on super edges
